static read(*args, **kwargs)¶
uid: uuid.UUID = UUID('636f1230-38c8-40e3-a9ae-1c84aa4947c8')¶
import_external_functions()¶
parse_arg(arg, arg_type) → Any¶
parse_args(func: Callable, args: List[str]) → List[Any]¶

Takes in func and returns properly parsed arguments Argument types are retrieved from type annotations and can be one of the following: - str - int - float - bool - List - None - Path - Optional - Union
